attributes.action: Stop making it so easy for Wills to be forged
attributes.additional_details: Introduce a body to manage Wills.  It is far to easy to forge a Will in the UK.  Wills to be signed infront of a judge and a copy of the Will to be lodged with the Court.  A huge task to implement but less people would die in testate, I am quite sure.  Wills can be forged in the UK with the greatest of ease.
